info.author: ritzMo
info.name: MovieEPG
info.shortdescription: Access the EPG from within the Movie Player
info.description: Allows you to access a modified service list from within the standard movie player. DO NOT install this plugin if you're using a nonstandard movie player, e.g. EMC. It will probably break and you might end up with a unusable movie player unless you uninstall one of the conflicting plugins.
